script:
1). Can you call headquarters and confirm this information?
Sure. I'll call them. 
No, I couldn't call.
They can't right now.
2). Does Alan usually drive to work?
Yes he did drive to work.
No, he didn't usually drive.
No, he takes the subway. 
3). She'll be back tomorrow, won't she?
Yes, she won't be.
Yes, I think she will. 
Yes, she went back.
